page.title: 19RELIGION
page.content: The Methodist revival had reached Bagillt by the late 18 century. However,it was not until the 1800's that chapels were established in any number.The working class parishoners left to worship in the chapels.The Anglicans looked into building a church of their own in Bagillt.Before they had to worship at the parish church,Holywell.The foundation stone was laid on 25th.March,1837.Many Bagillt farmers carried local stones to build the church.The church was consecrated on July18th.1839,by the Bishop of St.Asaph.In the church census in 1851,822 people attended Bethania chapel during morning and evening service,469 attended Tabernacle.In all 2329 attended worship in the village.Presently there are 6 chapels/churches in the village. Approximately 220 attend worship .
